long_description:
Of all the alcoholic beverages out there, none is as revered as the fermented grape juice we call wine. After all, a drink doesn’t stay around for thousands of years for no reasons. If the Egyptians and Phoenicians, some of earliest ancient civilizations known to drink wine, were in New York today and staying at the Royalton New York Hotel, we would take them on a tour of the city’s best wine bars and restaurants...

Since this is not so, we’ve prepared a list of top-rated and widely acclaimed eateries and bars especially for our guests—or any other person coming across this post! Expect an expertly curated selection of local, regional and international wines. And since wine is always better paired with food, many of these locales offer dishes that are just as delicious as their wines.

Babbo

Location: 110 Waverly Place, New York City, NY 10011
Decadent Italian food with unexpected twists and an Italian and French wine list. Try the vintage tasting menu.

Bar Boulud

Location: 1900 Broadway, New York, NY 10023
Casual french bistro serving traditional French charcuterie and wines, mostly from Burgundy and the Rhone Valley.

Casa Mono & Bar Jamón

Location: 52 Irving Place, New York City, NY 10003
A tapas bar serving Costa Brava-style cuisine. Check out their wine tastings.

City Winery

Location: 155 Varick Street, New York, NY 10013
Known as the urban wine country, here you’ll find locally made wine, dining and cultural events.

Kaia Wine Bar

Location: 1614 3rd Avenue, New York, NY 10128
Traditional South African dishes and wines served in an inviting Upper East Side wine bar.

Le Pif

Location: 465 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011
A French restaurant where you are guaranteed to be served the perfect wine and food pairing.

You’re now armed with everything you need for a great evening out with that perfect food-and-wine combo. When you’re ready to call it a night, your luxury room at the Royalton New York Hotel will be waiting for you. Don’t forget to pick up a few aspirins on the way back—just in case!
